text: Aleksandr Timofeyevich Aksinin (, 4 November 1954 - 28 July 2020)) was a Soviet athlete. He won a gold medal winner of the 4 × 100m relay at the 1980 Summer Olympics. He also won a bronze medal at the 1976 Summer Olympics. Aksinin was born in Leningrad. Aksinin died on 28 July 2020, aged 65.Александр Аксинин скончался на 66-м году жизни ==References== Category:1954 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Olympic gold medalists for the Soviet Union Category:Olympic bronze medalists for the Soviet Union Category:Soviet sprinters Category:Sportspeople from Saint Petersburg
title: Aleksandr Aksinin
